description:
Shinoa is the Squad Leader of "The Moon Demon Company". Her origin is Hiiragi Family who takes control of the Japanese Imperial Demon Army, and is the real sister of Hiiragi Mahiru who developed the Cursed Gear. Is a subordinate of Lieutenant Colonel Guren, and was appointed to supervise Hyakuya Yuuichiro.
Source: Official Page
name: Hiiragi Shinoa
